0:
”Alexa, set Gourmet thermostat to twenty.”
”Alexa, What is the temperature of Gourmet thermostat?”
”Alexa, turn off the lights.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Control your SmartLy devices through Alexa. It is necessary to link the account using the username and password registered in the SmartLy app. If you don't have an account yet, download the SmartLy app and create an account.
